title: Understanding Distribution Diagrams
text: A distribution diagram provides a visual representation of data spread.

title: Identifying Data Range
text: The range of data values can be easily identified in a distribution diagram.

title: Spotting Outliers
text: Outliers are visible as data points that deviate significantly from the rest of the data.

title: Recognizing Skewness
text: The skew of data values is observed by the asymmetry in the distribution diagram.

title: Standard Deviation Insight
text: The standard deviation is a measure of data spread that is not directly visible in a distribution diagram.
